page.title: 07CHURCH
page.content: The church which is used was built in 1854.It is built of stone from quarries on the island.The stone round the windows and doors is{yellow {sandstone}.This came from the shore near the old church.It is roofed in {blue slate}.The pews,pulpit and doors are{Oregon pine.}The inside roof is red pine and so are the boxes the paraffin lamps are attached to. In the porch there is a list of all the ministers who have been on the island starting in 1566 with{Rev {Thomas Rattray}.The present minister is{Rev Robert S Whiteford}.When the church was built it was named the {United Associate Church}but is now the Parish Church.This is because the{old {Parish Church}is badly needing repaired.The Church has 140 members.{Communion}is celebrated 4 times a year.
